name: Heart Fable
description:
What does it mean to be a warrior?

This is a IGMC entry using RPG Maker MZ (tile grid 32 x 32)!

This game may receive updates soon, untill the end of the Jam.

This is a Stars Walkers Spin Off.

Plot

Zu, Ava and Nico are three of the Golden Warriors, soldiers of justice and glory whose shiny armor flames on the horizon. Zu is a rebel, Ava has a sadness, Nico has a dream.

In what could be their last taks to retirement, they are called by the King to interrupt a rising evil to return, but in this journey they may find the truth about themselves and their greatest unknown secret: their Fable Heart. How is the heart under the golden armor?

This is a small tale about life, death and rebirth in many ways. 

The Fables

Every human being has it's own fable to live. Each of them is an extension of an inner and higher being, but sometimes they deliver empty pages in the end of the road. What could happen to them?

The Daemons

Beings from the other plans. The Golden Warriors fight them back when it's needed, but some of them may be speaking the truth.
